title: I really love DQ
body: Nothing says good times quite like a 4 man feeding simultaneously then flaming you. #FeelsGoodMan

replies.body:
I legitimately do enjoy dynamic queue. I enjoy queueing with friends in ranked.

What I _don't_ enjoy is that it's the only option, because it does kind of undermine the integrity of the experience for solo queuers.

I think there's merit in the idea, and am completely fine with there being two separate queues.
